```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

clim<- read.csv("YCOM_2019_Data.csv")
clim
us_cov<-read.csv("us_covid.csv")
```

```{r cars}
library(tidyverse)

library(dplyr)
score_func<- function(region){
  dat<-clim %>%
    filter(GeoName == region) %>%
    select(human,consensus,worried,futuregen,personal,harmUS) 
  
  rowSums(dat, na.rm = FALSE) / 6
}

```

```{r model}
us_cov<- us_cov %>%
  slice(-(1:158))%>%
  mutate(score)
 n<- dim(us_cov) 
 us_cov[1,15]<- score_func(us_cov[1,4])

state<-us_cov[9000,4]
score_func(state)
for (x in 10000){
  state<-us_cov[x,4]
  us_cov[x,15]<- score_func(state)
}
us_cov[2000, 15]
us_cov %>%
  slice(9000:10000)



```
